verses.text: <a href="../1-Peter-5-1/" title="1 Peter 5:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1  "JESUS_END"The elders which are among you I exhort, who am also an elder, and a witness of the sufferings of Christ, and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed:
2 "JESUS_END"Feed the flock of God which is among you, taking the oversight thereof, not by constraint, but willingly; not for filthy lucre, but of a ready mind;
3 "JESUS_END"Neither as being lords over God's heritage, but being ensamples to the flock.

<a href="../1-Peter-5-4/" title="1 Peter 5:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4  "JESUS_END"And when the chief Shepherd shall appear, ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away.

5 "JESUS_END"Likewise, ye younger, submit yourselves unto the elder. Yea, all of you be subject one to another, and be clothed with humility: for God resisteth the proud, and giveth grace to the humble.

<a href="../1-Peter-5-6/" title="1 Peter 5:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6  "JESUS_END"Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:
<a href="../1-Peter-5-7/" title="1 Peter 5:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.

<a href="../1-Peter-5-8/" title="1 Peter 5:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8  "JESUS_END"Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour:

<a href="../1-Peter-5-9/" title="1 Peter 5:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9  "JESUS_END"Whom resist stedfast in the faith, knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world.
10 "JESUS_END"But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.
11 "JESUS_END"To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.

<a href="../1-Peter-5-12/" title="1 Peter 5:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12  "JESUS_END"By Silvanus, a faithful brother unto you, as I suppose, I have written briefly, exhorting, and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand.
13 "JESUS_END"The church that is at Babylon, elected together with you, saluteth you; and so doth Marcus my son.
14 "JESUS_END"Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity. Peace be with you all that are in Christ Jesus. Amen.
